name: nfcdeq
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w0)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w0)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s1, s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

|- wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wcdeq(s0, s1, wb(w0, w1))

comment: If we have a conditional equality proof, where ` ph ` is ` ph ( x ) ` and ` ps ` is ` ph ( y ) ` , and ` ph ( x ) ` in fact does not have ` x ` free in it according to ` F/ ` , then ` ph ( x ) <-> ph ( y ) ` unconditionally. This proves that ` F/ x ph ` is actually a not-free predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
